vote.title: Authorize an increase to the construction services contract with Oscar Renda Contracting, Inc. for additional work associated with the rehabilitation of wastewater interceptors at three locations - Not to exceed $1,321,577.94, from $26,210,144.72 to $27,531,722.66 - Financing: Wastewater Capital Improvement G Fund
vote.description: Authorize an increase to the construction services contract with Oscar Renda Contracting, Inc. for additional work associated with the rehabilitation of wastewater interceptors at three locations - Not to exceed $1,321,577.94, from $26,210,144.72 to $27,531,722.66 - Financing: Wastewater Capital Improvement G Fund
